name: Doki Doki - Behind Closed Doors
description:
I first created Doki Doki - Behind Closed Doors in March 2018 after seeing Bijuu Mike play some mods by other people. I had never modded before, so the result was interesting to say the least. 

It was revised in 2019, then again in 2020, with new sprites being added, mistakes being fixed, and so on.

Behind Closed Doors has gained a surprising amount of traction, however, I look back on it as something I'm not fond of, as it was in my early days of coding with Ren'Py, and everything before I actually learned what I was doing could be considered cringe-worthy. 

However, it's been long enough that I can look back on it with fondness and nostalgia.

So, here it is.

Behind Closed Doors, the first DDLC mod I ever made.

I hope you enjoy it, and feel free to leave a comment below!

This mod contains dark, violent, and disturbing scenes.
